title: CopyFrom (Method)
text:
METHOD CopyFrom
Does a strcpy from the source string cbsSource into our instance at given positions
and a given length.
Note: No terminating 0 will be appended.

rows.Name: rcbsSource
rows.Comment: The source string, where the characters will be copied from

rows:
The 1 relative offset within the source string, where the
copying will start

The 1 relative offset within the source string, where the
copying to will start
The number of characters to copy
